column1: Miss Maxon's Third Grade Supply List
1. 8 black -and -white marble notebooks; labeled with child's full name and/or:
2. 2 plastic folders; labeled with child's full name and "Class Work" and 'Spanish'
4. 2 packages of non -erasable black pens with caps
7. 3 containers of Lysol (or other name brand) dinning wipes
